Text.val: gets a scrren-code and reads all the button labels for this particular
screen into a hashed map in main memory for fast access
24-MAR-2003 ASe, If there's no translation for the user's language, we check if
there's ANY translation and use that then. (SCR #3216)
we work on a copy of the input parameter since we evtl. want to change it
to user(0) if it is empty ...
// First check if we already have been called for this particular pi.SID
// If so - we do nothing; everything is already loaded to fltools.dll.
// If the system tables had been changed, the users needs to restart.
24-MAR-2003 ASe, if we did not find a translation for the user's language, we
check if there's ANY translation and use that ...
this task is called if we did not find a translation for the pb label in the
user's language. It will query without language and thereby set the
pb label to the FIRST translation it finds ... usually GB
